column4: Just installed ubuntu 11.10 Wanted to know how to check for updates ..... Might be a stupid question but 11.10 looks alot different then 10.04
I am hoping the Updates that i need to get will fix my Microphone problem.
Just installed Ubuntu 11.10 Don't know how to update drivers so i can get my microphone working any help would be greatful :)
I'd recommend finding out the name of your soundcard / motherboard and searching for keywords like "sound problem", etc.
